_header: Mercy me grant of all that I me complain
Note: Compare 4182 and cf. 2679 which incorporates 12 lines.
_description: His pitiless mistress — sixteen lines based on phrases from The Temple of Glass (1403), followed by lines 736-54, 762-3 from the same poem, adapted to form a personal petition

BLSl1212.First Lines:
Mercy me graunt all þat I me compleynet[hr]ow my lifis
                    soueraigne Plesaunz…
BLSl1212.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Weitere Beiträge zur englischen Lyric des 15 und 16
                Jahrhunderts.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         107 (1901): 48-61: 50.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 141-2.
